ingredients: 1   +   3/4 cups unsweetened pineapple juice, 1 cup white sugar, 2  eggs, beaten, 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 2   +   1/2 teaspoons salt, divided, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 (16 ounce) package acini di pepe pasta, 3 (11 ounce) cans mandarin oranges, drained, 2 (20 ounce) cans pineapple tidbits, drained, 1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained, 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed, 1 cup miniature marshmallows, 1 cup shredded coconut
nutrition: Total Fat 11g 14%, Saturated Fat 7g 37%, Cholesterol 37mg 12%, Sodium 648mg 28%, Total Carbohydrate 114g 41%, Dietary Fiber 4g 14%, Total Sugars 75g, Protein 9g, Vitamin C 30mg 150%, Calcium 55mg 4%, Iron 3mg 18%, Potassium 388mg 8%
